籤詩版本二:
Kuthiwa akuzwakali, izingubo ezinhle kanye neholo elihle kuzoholela ekuchumeni ngokwemvelo
Angikhumbuli ukuthi kwenzekani ngaleso sikhathi. Usavumelana nami.
詩意:
Le hexagram iyisithombe sengane ebona unina.
Inhlanhla kubo bonke abantu abahloniphekile.
解曰: Isetshenziselwa ithemba. Wonke umuntu ujabule. Kusukela ebuthweni lomphakathi. Njengendodana ihlangana nonina.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Dong Zhong ufuna izihlobo
U-Dong Zhong wayeyindodana ka-Dong Yong oBukhosini bakwa-Han. Wazalelwa inganekwane evela ezulwini eyehlela emhlabeni izoshada no-Dong Yong. Kamuva, ngemva kokuba inganekwane isisize u-Dong Yong ukuba akhokhe izikweletu zakhe futhi azihlenge, wabuyela ezulwini.
U-Dong Zhong, owayeneminyaka eyisikhombisa ubudala, wayevame ukuhlazeka ngenxa yokuthi wayengenanina, ngakho wayefuna ukumthola.
Ngaphansi kokuqondisa kukaMnu. Yi, u-Dong Zhong waya entabeni yase-Taibai eyombheka ngoJulayi 7. Inganekwane yavela futhi ekugcineni yabona unina.
聖意: Angikhululekile ekhaya, ngingumuntu ojwayelekile, ngithandazela inhlanhla, inhlanhla ebhizinisini, umshado nomshado, owesifazane ohamba ngezinyawo eLiujia uvimba amasimu, izikelemu zisenkingeni, kunzima ukuthola abantu ngenxa ukulahlekelwa yimfuyo, kunzima ukuyovula icala, ukufuduka kuyaqina, impahla elahlekile ayinalutho, izifo zithandazela inhlanhla ezintabeni nasemathuneni.
